components.description: The letter E, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter E

components.description: The letter A, which can be used as part of a regional indicator pair to create emoji flags for various countries.
components.title: Regional Indicator Symbol Letter A

description: The flag for Ceuta, Melilla, which may show as the letters EA on some platforms. Uses the same flag as Spain.
title: Flag: Ceuta & Melilla

emoji_net_data.definition: The flag for Ceuta, Melilla, which may show as the letters EA on some platforms. Uses the same flag as Spain. The Flag for Ceuta & Melilla e http://emojipedia.org/flag-for-ceuta-melilla/
emoji_net_data.name: Ceuta & Melilla

bn:00110978a: Of or pertaining to the people or culture of Spain.
Of or relating to or characteristic of Spain or the people of Spain
Of or relating to Spain, Spaniards, or the Spanish language.

bn:00083885v: To cause to move back and forth repeatedly.
To move or swing back and forth.
Move or swing back and forth
To move or swing a weapon back and forth, particularly if demonstrating skill.

bn:00034960n: Emblem usually consisting of a rectangular piece of cloth of distinctive design
A flag is a piece of fabric with a distinctive design that is used as a symbol, as a signaling device, or as decoration.
A piece of cloth, often decorated with an emblem, used as a visual signal or symbol.
Piece of fabric with a distinctive design

bn:03222815n: The flag of Spain, as it is defined in the Spanish Constitution of 1978, consists of three horizontal stripes: red, yellow and red, the yellow stripe being twice the size of each red stripe.

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
